oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Burton, George H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 11; East; 19; 20.0x40.0; 281; I; 07/01/1844; Originally the lot sold bordered / on Central Ave, but in April, 1846 Mr. Burton changed the lot to this lot on Oak Ave.; Burton, Chas. 1826-1856; Burton, Fannie M. 1864-65; Burton, Fannie McG. 1838-1864; Burton, George H. 1803-1846; Burton, Georgetta E. 1842-1865; Burton, Joseph G. 1840-1857; Burton, Lydia E. 1835 (inf); Burton, Margaret A. 1836-1849; Burton, Mary A. 1831-1858; Burton, Nancy O.C. 1841-1860; Conn, George 1838-39; Jones, Bettie J.; Jones, W.F.; Sigler, Mrs. Elizabeth 1803-1882
